availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, bottler and grocer. New Hampshire native. Married to Helen Mary Hale Chickering. Father of Frank Chickering, Isabel Chickering, Alice Chickering, Alvin Chickering, Katie Chickering, Ida Chickering, and Lilly Chickering.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 2, p. 259.
“A. A. Chickering, Sr.,” Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), April 1, 1896, p. 10.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910). Microfilm rolls #994027-994058. Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky.
Find A Grave, "Alvin Alexander Chickering (1821-1896)," Memorial #95039583, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=95039583&ref=acom (accessed October 6, 2017).
